description: This is the translated sig table.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SIG_TRANSLATED
columns.description: This column stores the user entered translation of the sig. Translated sig will be printed on the patient prescription label if it's entered.
